name: In the Time of Pandemia
description:
GOAL: SAVE AS MANY LIVES AS POSSIBLE

Actions:

Buy test kits , Test, Hospitalize, Quarantine, Lockdown

Colors:

Green = healthy or untested, Yellow = asymptomatic, Orange = symptomatic,
Red = severe, Purple = critical, Gray = recovered,
Dark gray or tombstone = deceased.

Notes:

Characters that move generate a daily income of $3.20 each for the town. 

The chart at the bottom is a stacked bar graph.

WIP — Version 0.6.4.3. Thanks to Jamdemic 2020 for the initial push!

Credits:

Lead Game Developer: Khail Campos Santia

Visual Artists: Ramon del Prado & Linya Fernandez

Composers: Algernon Van Peel, Filip Žarković, & Jom Ouano

Inspired by Raph Koster's call and game design sketch for an interactive COVID-19 simulation; Grant Sanderson 's  video, "Simulating an epidemic"; and John Albano's earlier interpretation of the same themes.
